summary:
this is a player home / castle mod that add\'s a good sized house with a basement to the world located near the Mountain next to whiterun it has all the space that you need and storage and the equipment it is also good for a good player gang hideout for you and your follower\'s

Please tryout and test and please give me any feedback if you wish a
descriptionHtml:
This Mod Is my first mod and it might seem to be overpowering to be a house mod as so:
the crafting utilities
1 - alchemy bench
1 - enchanting bench
1 - staffmaking bench
1 - anvil
1 - tampering workbench
1 - tanning rack
1 - grinding wheel thingy
plenty of manaquin\'s
Item\'s
this mod may contain item\'s that may be overpowering
sets of thieve\'s guild armour
master guild armour
sets of linwei\'s armour
dragon claw Deco\'s
dragon desk deco\'s
jewel\'s - food and other so on stuff...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My Other Mods:
Isandaar Hideout  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34352
Make NPCs Followers  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34497
Bat Teleports For Quick Travelling  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34595
EpiclyWhit3s Mods and Info  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34666
Marriable NPCs  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34655
Unenchanted Thieves Armour Set - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34971
Thieves Vault - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34952

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
isandaar was created by EpiclyWhit3 for the reason
of making a player base using the Hearthfires DLC
and the Dragonborns DLC as required it is useful to
use this mod with another mod called MyHomeIsyourHome
that will allow you to place loads of follower\'s there
and also using UFO Follower aswell and it will not
conflict with this mod and they are really good
mods to have with this mod. Thank You for Trying my
mod.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please tryout and test and please give me any feedback if you wish and if you dont like it please
do not hate this is my first mod.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EpiclyWhit3
author: EpiclyWhit3
